en.bookingPolicy: For training or reservations, email lab@ii.unam.mx with instrument, date options, and brief purpose. Internal users may request extended blocks with a PI approval.
en.collaboration: We welcome collaborations. For external users, we can discuss service agreements and co-authorship when appropriate.
